text: Euxestidae is a family of beetles in the order Coleoptera, formerly included within the family Cerylonidae. ==Selected Genera== * Euxestoxenus Arrow, 1925 * Euxestus Wollaston, 1858 * Hypodacne LeConte, 1875 * Hypodacnella Slipinski, 1988 * Metacerylon Grouvelle, 1906 * Protoxestus Sen Gupta & Crowson, 1973 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Coccinelloidea Category:Polyphaga families
title: Euxestidae
